name: 1 to 0
description:
A 2D platformer where the main mechanic is allowing the player to slip into the walls and floors. You must switch all three levers and reach the goal to complete the level. Currently with 5 levels.

Please leave a comment, I'd love to hear any feedback you can offer!

Made for the Grapefruit GameJam #3

Sadly I wasn't able to get any sound in time.
